metadata.title: Home
metadata.summary: Visit BBC News for up-to-the-minute news, breaking news, video, audio and feature stories. BBC News provides trusted World and UK news as well as local and regional perspectives. Also entertainment, business, science, technology and health news.

headlines.headline: Sturgeon says Scotland does not want Brexit

items.summary: SNP leader Nicola Sturgeon says voting for her party in the European elections will send a clear message that Scotland is not for Brexit.

media.title: SNP: 'Keep Scotland at the heart of Europe'

synopses.short: SNP: 'Keep Scotland at the heart of Europe'
synopses.long:
Scottish First Minister Nicola Sturgeon has said voting for the SNP in the upcoming European parliamentary elections will send a clear message to Westminster that Scotland is not for Brexit.

Her comments came as she launched the SNP's election campaign ahead of the vote on 23 May.

The government has confirmed the European Parliamentary elections will go ahead then.

media.caption: SNP leader Nicola Sturgeon: "Scotland has had enough of the Westminster chaos and Scotland does not want Brexit."

items.overtypedSummary: Nicola Sturgeon says a vote for the SNP will send a message Scotland is not for Brexit.

synopses.short: Prince Harry receives Invictus Games baby-gro for newborn son Archie

The Duke of Sussex is in the Hague for the Invictus Games. 

His newborn son, Archie Harrison Mountbatten-Windsor was introduced to the world yesterday.

headlines.headline: 'I'm a personal trainer with cerebral palsy'

items.summary: Doctors thought Steph Hammerman would never walk or talk. Now she has opened her own CrossFit gym.

media.title: 'I'm a personal trainer with cerebral palsy'

synopses.short: Meet the world's first CrossFit trainer with cerebral palsy
synopses.long:
Steph Hammerman was born with cerebral palsy and doctors believed she would never walk, talk, read or write.

But the 29-year-old from North Carolina, who has also fought off cancer, has become the world's first CrossFit trainer with the condition.

Cerebral palsy is the name for a group of lifelong conditions that affect movement and co-ordination.

Video produced by Daniel South
synopses.medium: Doctors thought Steph Hammerman would never walk or talk. Now she has opened her own CrossFit gym.

media.caption: Meet the world's first CrossFit trainer with cerebral palsy

indexImage.caption: Meet the world's first CrossFit trainer with cerebral palsy

headlines.headline: Blind Ernie and guide duck Elmo a quack team

items.summary: At 21, Ernie the duck has reached more than double the average age for his breed.

media.title: The birthday duckling who's lived for 21 years

synopses.short: The birthday duckling who's lived for 21 years
synopses.long:
As a day-old duckling, Ernie was given to Chloe as a present on her 10th birthday.

Twenty-one years on he's still going strong, with the help of his friend Elmo, at his home near Thame in Oxfordshire.

So far he's lived more than twice as long as the average for his breed and he's still living life to the full.
synopses.medium: Ernie is a Call duck and 21 years old -  which makes him more than double the average age for his breed.

media.caption: The birthday duckling who's lived for 21 years

headlines.headline: Massive pot plant takes over office

items.summary: Protective Solutions Ltd in Stroud has a plant that wraps its way around the entire building.

media.title: Crazy Office Plant

synopses.long: Company director Des Brannan, bought the plant from B&Q 10 years ago. It quickly outgrew his own home and so he brought it down to the unit. It thrives from the heat of all the computers and Des takes good care of it, pinning it up and taking off dead foliage... his colleges not so much, who aren't keen on the spiders it seems to attract.
synopses.medium: Protective Solutions Ltd in Stroud has a plant that wraps its way around the entire building

media.caption: The plant has thrived from the heat of the computers and is now more than 300ft (90m) long

indexImage.altText: Protective Solutions Ltd in Stroud has a plant that wraps its way around the entire building
indexImage.copyrightHolder: Company director Des Brannan, bought the plant fro
